body:
Comment 5: 
Thanks.  That output implies that the external linker is not being used.  And now that I
think about it that is normal for this case, as the external linker is not needed to
handle a shared library.

So now I think the problem is that 6l's -r option is not supported for Mach-O.  I don't
see any support for it--I only see support for it for ELF.  I don't know what needs to
be done here.
_Labels changed: added **expertneeded**._
